author: rbb
msg: Bring file_io up to the new parameter order for APR.  I have decided to do
these on a directory by directory basis for the rest of APR.  I hope to
cause fewer problems for other developers by doing it this way.

author: rbb
msg: Make time functions threadsafe in APR.  This is the current way to make
a function thread-safe, when the C Run-Time function it relies on is NOT
thread-safe.  For more information, please read the message that will be
posted to new-httpd@apache.org regarding this topic.

author: rbb
msg: Remove a line of code that shouldn't have been left in.

author: stoddard
msg: Create the aprlib.dll exports file (aprlib.def) and update the project and make files to include it.
